interests.title: Basketball
interests.description: Passionate about basketball both as a player and coach

highlights.title: UVA Women's Basketball Practice Player
highlights.description: Contributing to the University of Virginia Women's Basketball Team as a practice player, helping the team prepare for games and improve their skills

highlights.title: Give & Go Basketball Camp Coach
highlights.description: Teaching fundamentals of basketball to elementary aged children at Second Baptist Church camp, fostering a love for the sport and teamwork

interests.title: Economics
interests.description: Double major in Economics with a passion for understanding market dynamics and business strategy

highlights.title: UVA Economics Club Member
highlights.description: Active member of the Economics Club, engaging in discussions about economic theory, policy, and real-world applications

interests.title: Teaching & Mentorship
interests.description: Dedicated to helping others learn and grow in technology and beyond

highlights.title: Head Teaching Assistant
highlights.description: Lead TA for database systems course, mentoring students on complex database concepts and SQL optimization

interests.title: Community Service
interests.description: Committed to giving back through various community initiatives

highlights.title: Sigma Alpha Lambda Honor Society
highlights.description: Member of national leadership and honors organization focused on service, scholarship, and fellowship
